shortDescription.default: Enhance SharePoint customizations with modern Material-UI components for sleek, consistent web parts.

longDescription.default: Integrate Material-UI components into SPFx web parts for a modern and visually appealing SharePoint experience. Customizable and easy to use.

features.title: mui-spfx-controls Feature
features.description: The feature that activates elements of the mui-spfx-controls solution.
